Walking into the ring, this was Rick's first time in the all-male event. That said, this was only like his second or third fight, so he could hardly say that he was used to the other tourneys just yet. He walked in with the same mild curiosity that he had every other ring, noting how it was smaller and cozier to match the simplistic nature of the contest. This was to be a head-to-head, no-funny-business, no fancy tools, good old-fashioned tickle fight. Simple in execution and design.

The boy still hadn't received anything more to wear other than his jockstrap, leaving everything but his dangly bits exposed for the crowd to see. He was getting used to it, but he had hoped that the crowd would be more interested in fair fights so that he might get some more protection. That wasn't turning out to be the case though: they were just as happy to see the poor sap get tickled as any real competition that might be going on at other times.

Sighing internally, Rick entered the ring regardless, showing a genuine half-smile as he waved to the crowd, which answered back with an enthusiastic cheer as they recognized their favorite punching bag.

Name: Recien

Species: Orc

Gender: Male

Appearance: More human than mutated. Athletic build. About 5'11". Light blue skin. Olive green eyes. Full obsidian warrior armor. (Helmet, chest piece, leggings, boots, gauntlets) Light green, thigh high stockings.

Most ticklish spots: Feet(mainly socked), groin, and sides

Ticklishness: 97
Endurance:89

Adult tickler: Yep

Recien is a bit of an outcast. Though an excellent warrior, his tribe banished him for a lack of brute strength. That and his preference towards men. Coming to the tournament was a way for him to finally have a home. That, and a way to have some fun. As long as he can keep his boots on.
1122.title: Challenger

choices: Recien enters the ring opposite and announces himself.
Recien enters the ring opposite and presses the attack.
Recien was already in the ring and attacks quickly.
11221.content:
Walking into the ring, this was Rick's first time in the all-male event. That said, this was only like his second or third fight, so he could hardly say that he was used to the other tourneys just yet. He walked in with the same mild curiosity that he had every other ring, noting how it was smaller and cozier to match the simplistic nature of the contest. This was to be a head-to-head, no-funny-business, no fancy tools, good old-fashioned tickle fight. Simple in execution and design.

The boy still hadn't received anything more to wear other than his jockstrap, leaving everything but his dangly bits exposed for the crowd to see. He was getting used to it, but he had hoped that the crowd would be more interested in fair fights so that he might get some more protection. That wasn't turning out to be the case though: they were just as happy to see the poor sap get tickled as any real competition that might be going on at other times.

Sighing internally, Rick entered the ring regardless, showing a genuine half-smile as he waved to the crowd, which answered back with an enthusiastic cheer as they recognized their favorite punching bag.
11221.title: The Rookie vs The Orc Knight

112211.content:
Recien grinned behind his helmet as he entered. The thunderous cheers of the crowd were dulled by his helmet. He didn't even notice that his opponent was mostly nude. He was far too distracted enjoying the mighty cheers of the crowd.

Recien pounded on his armored chest, holding both fist in the air as if he was already victorious. Finally he set his eyes on his opponent and couldn't help but laugh.

"Such little covering? This will be easy." Recien advanced towards the center.
112211.title: Recien enters the ring opposite and announces h...

1122112.content:
This wasn't even fair. Someone in full plate armor going against someone in a jock strap? Rick knew he was the losing card in most of his fights, but this went beyond stacking the deck. This was as one-sided as they came.

Even though the Rookie was resolved to try his hardest despite his low circumstances, there simply wasn't anything he could do. When the two met in the middle of the ring, Rick immediately began running his hands over the armor, looking for gaps. There simply weren't any, not that Rick could get to anyway. There was nothing he could do as the orc lifted the tiny human easily with only one arm, holding him in the air for a moment before flinging him a bit and pressing him into the ground.

"Ooph," was all Rick could remark.

Neither wear much at all, only a leather top wrapped around their chests, and a loincloth at their waists. Jaqi and Vixy are both beautiful aside from their short stature: flat, toned stomachs, elegant curves, firm legs, alluring if not busty breasts, and no more than an ounce of fat on their bodies. It's all too easy to become distracted by their bare skin.

Do to the playful nature of their race, Jaqi and Vixy aren't very good at resisting temptation, causing them to recklessly jump in for an opportunistic tickle even when it might be a trap. They also aren't very good at resisting the sensation, bursting with laughter and squirming around after even a quick tickling. While they aren't the best at holding it in, they're gifted ticklers, having a knack for knowing exactly which spots to exploit, and just how to tease. Their only downfall is that they occasionally get too playful, taking their time and dragging out the tickling enough that the victim can get away or get them back.

[Secret Information]: Jaqi and Vixy love to tease, but are exceptionally bad at taking it in return. A hand slowly descending on a vulnerable tummy, or teasing words whispered in their ears, being forced to admit they're ticklish and where… all these things get to them especially badly.

145211.content:
Jaqi and Vixy walk through the item room on their side of the arena, trying to pick out the best tool. "Hey, what about these things?" Vixy says, picking up a handful of darts with fat, wide feathers on the ends. "I wonder what they do?" Without a second thought, she starts throwing them at her partner, one feather dart then another zipping towards Jaqi. As they get to her, they hover over her and begin to brush the feather end quickly over 's bare blue skin, darting around like insects to avoid her swatting hands.

"Hehehehe, hey! Stahahahap it!" Jaqi cried out, giggling quickly as the feather darts roam over her body. Vixy tries to call the darts back by waving her hands, and surprisingly the darts obey, flying back and landing in her hand again.

"Hmm, those might be useful…" Vixy muses, "but what about this?" She picks up a net tightly wound up into a ball, looking at it curiously. Turning to Jaqi, who was still brushing the feathery feeling off her skin, Vixy tossed the ball into the air. "Hey, Jaqi… catch!"

"Wait, what?" Jaqi cried out, as the ball burst open, unfurling into a net that wrapped itself around Jaqi, sending her to the floor. "H-hey! Get this thing offa me!" She said, her struggling getting her only more and more wound up in the net, as if it were a spider's web.

"Aw, this thing doesn't even tickle? That's no fun…" Vixy says, helping pull the annoying, strangely sticky net off of Jaqi. While it would've been easy to tickle her like this, the imps both agreed that they wanted something with a more immediate effect.

"Ooh, this one looks good!" Vixy said, bounding ahead to a long fluffy feather about 18 inches long. Not even bothering to read the description of the item, she picked it up by its handle and turned towards Jaqi. "En garde!"

"Hey, not again! Eeehehehehehe nohohoho!" Jaqi said, bursting into another giggle fit as Vixy brushed the feather along her side. Grinning, Vixy moved it along Jaqi's tummy in a slow slicing motion, to excellent effect. Vixy giggled even louder, but also let out a surprising moan. "Eheheehehee… ooohohohoho! Ooh, Vixy-ehehehehe stahahahap!"

"Why… do you liiiiike it?" Vixy whispered in the other imp's ear as she teased, slowing down the feather's motion but continuing to press it against Jaqi's belly. Jaqi could only not as she bit her lip, the tickling strangely mixing with an arousing sensation that would've been clear had either bothered to read that the feather dagger was magically enchanted to arouse any body part it touched. Grinning, Vixy pulled away, smiling triumphantly at her panting partner. "This one! This is the one to use!"

"Ooh… hehehe… fine." Jaqi agreed, "But you're going first after all that tickling you gave me. Vixy only nodded, eager to try out the weapon.

Vixy strode out into the arena, Jaqi staying on the other side of the gate, waiting to be tagged in at need. Vixy looked around, not seeing her opponent yet, whoever it was. "Come out, come out, wherever you are!" Vixy called out playfully, and took the time to stretch out her short body alluringly, showing off all her tickle spots in an irresistible display if anyone were to be watching.

1452111.content:
"Come on Giselle, let's get our tools!" Cassie cheers as she enters the item room on their side of the arena. Giselle, or Madame Maid, enters after her peppy teammate.

"Oh my." The French woman was amazed at so many tools used for tickling. Feathers of various sizes, nets to capture people, even a sword shaped like a feather.

"Gotcha!" Giselle squealed as a pink ribbon wraps around her waist. Cassie gives a hearty tug and pulls Giselle over to her. The maid squirms and giggles as Fire Ball grabs her hips and squeezes them. "Hehe-Cassie I'm on your team!" The giggling maid finally gets out. Cassie smiles and lets her go.

"I know, but I wanted to try my tool! Look!" Giselle could see it was a expanding ribbon of some sort, like what you found with a cheerleader. "Oh, how fitting Cassie." She teased as Fire Ball made a series of spins and twirls with her tool of choice.

"You like it? It so fits me!" The redhead adopted her cutest smile which caused the maid to blush heavily. Cassie's natural charm could work her magic on her teammates as well. In particular, Giselle blushed hard as Cassie pivoted around to show off her rear. Fire Ball giggled, she liked her teammate, and enjoyed teasing the older woman.

"How about this Maidy!" Cassie put a tool into her hands. Giselle looked down; it was a feather duster, with a multitude of feathers. Cassie, curious, brushed her hand over the feathers, and burst into a sharp fit of laughter. It took a few seconds for her to calm down.

"I guess they're super ticklish." Fire Ball nodded with a smile, "Those imps won't stand a chance." She started to lead her friend out to the arena.

"Aren't you worried at all? They love to tickle, and your not wearing much." Giselle looked at her in concern. Out of all the contenders, Cassie Baker had one of the most revealing outfits, just a pink sports bra and spandex shorts with tennis shoes and knee high socks. Cassie bragged to her before that her shorts were incredible strong. They were tight, but were also incapable of being torn off, only stretched.

"I'll be ok! I can always charm them, and I'm so quick they can't catch me!" Cassie hugged her as a gesture of friendship. "You'll be fine too Giselle, just keep your dress on!" Madame Maid smiled a little; even now, Fire Ball liked to tease and flirt.

From the moment he'd arrived, Rick was swept around in deluge of confusing information that overwhelmed him. Never had he tried to process so much so quickly. This was literally his first day, and already he was pushed into the ring, given calm assurances that he'd be a hit and that he would do well regardless. What he didn't know, or at least didn't remember, was that this match was just as much a show as it was a competition. No one was seriously expecting him to win, which was why anything he did would be okay. Besides, gamblers always liked a risky bet with high rewards, so the naive and gullible Rick fit the bill well.

At least he'd been given the grace of arriving first. Silva switches positions with Sareth, as its time for her turn!
15232212213.content:
As both contestants giggled and squirmed as they tried to find where on their opponent's sides were most ticklish, Rick's hopes fell as he felt two hands slip underneath the crook of his elbows, pulling his arms up as he was caught in a deadlock from behind, the feeling of two soft things pressing into his back already giving a hint as to who was the culprit.

"Trying to escape from me, hmmm? You aren't getting out of my grasp this time." Blushing as Sareth pushed her chest into his back, The Rookie had almost forgotten about the person whom he was tickling, Silva now with a small light of vengeance in her eyes. Taking advantage of her partner's distraction, Silva leaned forward, her fingers spidering all across Rick's bare naval and ribs as he gave out a bark of laughter before collapsing into a constant stream of giggles, unable to pull free of the succubus' grasp.

"No fair-ahaahahahaaa! You're teaming up on me! Gaahahahaahaaa!" Trying to use his legs to push the Huntress away, Silva clicked her tongue in mock annoyance, speeding up the wiggling of her fingers.

"I would have loved to match you in a match of tickling attrition, but I have to win this after all. No hard feelings, eh?" Digging into his sides even harder than usual, Rick let out an uncharacteristic squeal, before collapsing back into laughter, the sound of his own hysterics filling his mind.

Narrowing her eyes, Sareth watched on, bored, as her partner continued to wear down the Rookie, not even giving him so much of a break. "Are you just about done? I would like to have a go at tickling him as well, while he is conscious, thank you very much."

"And when did I say I would do that?" Giving Rick another couple of pokes, the Huntress didn't even as much bat an eyelid at her partner's subtle hint. "I'll pass you to him once I've payed him back for tickling me earlier."
15232212213.title: The Succubus makes her entrance, ending the str...

choices: The Succubus lets him go for a moment, and he darts for the lower floors.
The Succubus lets him go for a moment, but the Huntress grabs him.
The Succubus notices and uses her wings to teach him a little lesson.
152322122131.content:
Just as Rick's luck was about to pick up once again, or so it seemed, his plan was dashed once again on the competency of his opponents. First foiled by the Huntress' recovery and veterancy, then by the efforts of the Succubus and her... well, her ability to just walk up behind him and restrain him without hindrance. The disadvantage of being outnumbered, it appeared.

With light, boyish laughter spilling forth unbridled from his lungs, Rick couldn't do anything to stop his ticklish torment. Even his desperate kicks at the Huntress yielded nothing, the stern-faced woman simply absorbing the weak kicks or side stepping the stronger ones. His belly, his navel, his sides, all free range for her roaming fingers, forcing him to twist and squirm in the headlock the Succubus had him in. This was quite a bad predicament, to be sure.

However, even though Rick was currently busy laughing, he did have enough presence of mind to her the Succubus' gripe. She wanted in on it too. While the thought of her taking over scared the Rookie quite a bit, it did give him an idea as to how to get free. It was a long shot, but it was all he could think of right now.

Gradually, but very quickly, Rick started going limp. Faking a very low endurance, he began to hang without resistance from the Succubus' grip, trying to lull her into thinking he'd been exhausted. Of course, he could still run a marathon after this, such was his gift, but they didn't necessarily know that. If they thought he was weak enough to move positions, he could make a break for it, maybe find somewhere to hide too.
152322122131.title: The Rookie displays his wit.

choices: He found something in the lower levels.
He looked back and decided this was too good of an opportunity.
1523221221311.content:
"Hey! Swap with me already, I'm getting tired just from holding him. And he's exhausted already, I'd much rather prefer tickling squirming prey then limp ones, Huntress." Pouting impatiently, Sareth tapped one foot on the ground, the weight in her arms growing heavier and heavier by each passing second as Rick attempted to feign that his endurance was all but gone, which seemed to be working so far.

"Are you sure he's already tired just from that little bit of tickling? Its been only a few minutes, according to my internal body clock." Narrowing her eyes in suspicion, Silva leaned in to look closely, trying to make sure that the Rookie wasn't trying to pull any tricks with them as Rick purposely let out ragged breaths of air, wishing that she wouldn't find out what he was trying to do.

"Oh whatever, its my turn now! Let me have a go!" Dropping her arms from underneath Rick's underarms, the latter knew that this was the opportunity he had been patiently waiting for. As soon as he felt that nothing was holding him, he quickly grabbed Silva's shoulders, the Huntress caught off guard the second time as she felt him push her behind, right into Sareth. Tripping over her shoes, Silva could do nothing as gravity took a hold of her, plowing her right into a similarly surprised Sareth, both of them going doing onto the floor.

"G-Get off me, you clumsy woman! H-Hey! Don't touch-eeheheeheee!" As their bodies became quickly entangled, both of the women quietly snickered and chuckled as they tried to pull away from each other, 'accidentally' poking and prodding at each other when they tried to pull away from one another.

"Now's my chance to run! If I can just get to the lower levels, there might be something for me to even the odds of this fight!" Giving himself a nod of encouragement, Rick was about the descend the steps when...
1523221221311.title: The Succubus lets him go for a moment, and he d...

choices: The Huntress is hit by the bolt and distracted!
The Succubus is hit by the bolt and distracted!
The Rookie misses entirely, leaving himself vulnerable.
15232212213111.content:
The gamble paid off well. Much like Rick had suspected, the Succubus that was holding him open and vulnerable was anxious to tickle him herself, and so her guard was down even though she was the one holding him. The Huntress was much sharper in that regard, and almost found him out - a moment that set his heart a flutter. Fortunately, the Succubus' impatience got the better of her, and the moment Rick was free he shoved the two women into each other before darting down the stairs and out of sight.

Behind him, he heard the two teammates giggle as they tried to untangle themselves, obviously having some amusement at each others' expense. That worked fine for Rick. While he might've been able to get some good advantages, there was no way he would be able to hold two women down, and the moment even one of them was free he was back to where he started. Better to try to hide and see if he could split them up as they searched for him.

That was the plan before he entered the tower proper. Once inside, however, he saw the vast array of tools displayed before him, entire weapon racks and display cases chock full of devices he didn't recognize, although there were some more mundane things strewn about. Even better to hide, but these would also be a great equalizer to give him an advantage.

Rick ducked behind one weapon rack and quickly looked through what was nearby. He didn't have much time to make a decision, although he would've very much liked to be able to test out each device individually to see the full range of capabilities on them. What drew his eye was a particularly nasty looking crossbow, with a clip on top of its launcher as well as multiple firing modes. He gingerly lifted it off its display, taking a second to investigate before he heard footsteps echo down the stairwell.

He ducked down beneath the display case from which he'd taken the weapon. This would be a good opportunity to split them up, if he could land a shot. When he heard the footsteps emerge from the stairwell and into the room, he rose and fired quickly at the open doorway.
15232212213111.title: The Rookie finds something in the lower levels.

choices: The object thrown was bad for Rick.
152322122131112.content:
"Oh where are you, my little tickle toy? Come out and play with me!" Prancing down the steps with un-held glee, Sareth reached the floor below the highest floor of the tower, one hand over her eyes as she squinted into the distance, trying to see where both her partner's and her opponent had gone. "I haven't had my fun with you yet, since that stingy Huntress hogged you all to herself. If you come out right now, I promise I'll be extra gentle, along with letting you lick my toes."

Wandering further into the various exhibits of tickle tools and equipment, she eventually became extremely annoyed by the goose chase, inwardly gritting her teeth. "I said, come out now, and perhaps I'll let you live, mortal."

Sensing something flying out of the darkness by the corner of her eye, Sareth quickly turned a full one-eighty as she used one wing to shield herself, the projectile harmlessly latching onto the scaly outer surface of her wing. Lowering her wing to inspect the bolt that had attached itself to it, Sareth raised one eyebrow, questioning its intent. However, as soon as she had realized what Rick had just done, she started walking towards where the bolt had been fired from, a confident smirk on her face.

"Did you really think that would have been enough to stop me, Mr Rookie? I bet you didn't know that us demons have extremely good reflex as well, as well as extremely sensitive receptors. If I listen closely, I can even hear your very breath in this enclosed area. But no matter, since you were so kind to give your location away, its time to end this chase. No more running away, you ticklish boy."

Walking on, Sareth casually reached her side, in order to pull the hindrance which had been shot onto her wing. However, as she yanked the projectile out, a feeling of giddiness and lightness overtook her, the sensation of wanting to giggle rising up within her throat. Unknowing to both Rick and Sareth, the bolt which the latter had just yanked out had been one with the effect of 'Laughing Gas' upon it, activating as soon as the victim tried to pull the bolt out.

Clutching her head and sides with one hand, Sareth's strides slowed down to a crawl as she stood still, quietly snickering to herself as she tried her best to concentrate on finding Rick, failing miserably as the latter also wondered what was going on, hearing the chuckling of the demoness to be extremely strange.

As Silva also strode down the steps, she saw her partner, laughing to herself like a fool in the middle of the room. Assuming the worst case scenario that Rick had already gotten a weapon and attacked Sareth with it, the Huntress ducked behind a glass case as she grabbed the nearest tickle tool she could find, throwing it towards where she had seen something moving in the darkness (which was Rick).
152322122131112.title: The Succubus is hit by the bolt and distracted!

choices: The team has trouble finding him.
The team find him quickly and make a plan.
The Huntress gives chase immediately, able to jump him.
1523221221311122.content:
A surge of confidence and pride welled within Rick's chest as he landed a shot on the Succubus, thrilled that his new plan had worked so far and that he'd managed to peg one of his pursuers, but that all quickly deflated when he saw the Succubus disregard the shot entirely and continue her approach with more than a hint of menace in her eyes. Rick moved back, ducking behind another weapon rack further away, trying to keep his distance from the intimidating inhuman dominatrix.

Then, as the Succubus removed that which had struck her, the weapon's effects finally seemed to kick in. With strange abnormal giggling pouring out of her throat (a sound almost as scary as the rest of her), Rick knew that he'd scored a minor victory, although he had no idea just how minor the effect would turn out to be.

Before Rick could celebrate, something landed at his feet that caused him to jump, having forgotten about the Huntress' involvement momentarily. It didn't erupt into a ball of ticklish electricity or anything of the sort, however. The small orb instead rolled forward a bit and began quickly emitting a cloud of warm white smoke, sort of like steam but without the humidity. It didn't block sight completely, perhaps being one of the cheaper or less effective models, but it did make it difficult to peer through.

Not a moment was wasted. Rick immediately used the cover of the smoke to run deeper into the tower, moving through rooms without stopping to look, not the seating area by the window nor the large artsy studio that he dashed through. All he was focused on was putting distance between himself and his attackers.

Once he was satisfied with the amount of ground covered, he ducked behind another display case in a second weapon room, hiding from sight while looking around for anything that would be immediately useful to him. He had some time to make a plan.
1523221221311122.title: Unintended aid.

choices: The Rookie didn't chance it, and ran further into the room.
He thought it was the same harmless gas, and decided to stay in the same spot.
15232212213111221.content:
Pressing her face-mask as tightly as she could over her mouth as soon as she saw smoke erupting from one side of the room, Silva cautiously stayed still, observing what Rick might be planning up his sleeves. After a few seconds of seeing her partner still conscious and giggling to herself, oblivious of the smoke screen that had been laid down around her, the Huntress ascertained that whatever their opponent had activated wasn't that harmful to her, unlike sleeping gas, for example.

Using her free hand to swipe away as much of the translucent gas as she could, Silva slowly walked towards where she had thrown whatever she had grabbed, not caring for her partner who was still giggling like a lunatic, most of her weight leaning against one side of the wall, a wide silly grin plastered on her face.

As her hands carelessly brushed against where she had taken the object which she had thrown, Silva spotted another similar object beside it, this one with a different description. As an idea slowly formed inside her mind, Silva's lips curled into a devilish grin underneath her mask, knowing how she might be able to easily catch her prey once and for all.

Taking the time to catch his breath as well as slow his furiously beating heart, the Rookie, who was currently in just a few rooms down the corridor, had taken up refuge behind a rather large brief case, the entrance to the room in his full view, where he will be able to spot either of his adversaries coming, the cross-hair's of his crossbow trained on whatever might dare to enter the room.

As a few tortuous minutes passed by, which felt like hours for the nervous Rookie, something finally happened. Eyes wide in alarm, Rick inwardly started to panic again as he saw now white smoke slowly creeping into the room from the outside. However, as soon as he remembered the ball of gas which he had used to his advantage against the Silva and Sareth just now, Rick calmed down a little, knowing that it was harmless. "Okay, calm down, it doesn't do anything... Whew... The moment she steps into this room, I'll just shoot one bolt, and since she won't see it coming, I'll defintitely nail her!"

Unbeknownst to the naive Rookie, the Huntress casually hid behind the wall on the outside of the room, having thrown the gas grenade inside mere moments ago, hefting another one in her hand. "This tower is so useful. So much items in order to flush out people in hiding! Harmless smoke grenades, along with these little bad boys, 'Tickling Grenades'! If he thinks they're the same as the ones that got activated before, he's going to be absolutely tickled pink in surprise."
15232212213111221.title: The team has trouble finding him.

choices: The woman's reflexes prove too good, and she avoids the shots entirely.
The woman's reflexes save her the bulk of it, but one bolt snags her.
The woman's reflexes are too slow, and all three land hits on her.
152322122131112212.content:
On the surface, there wasn't any reason for Rick to suspect that he might actually be threatened by the gas slowly creeping into the room. It was as thin and airy as the gas grenade that had been thrown before, with the same color and texture. The reasonable conclusion one would come to after that previous experience was that whoever was on the other side would wait until the smoke screen got a bit thicker and then use it as cover to enter the room. Although not a perfect barrier, it would make aiming in the steamy smoke rather difficult, so that was what Rick was expecting.

It didn't seem to register with him that, as time passed and the smoke began seeping further into the room, it didn't seem to be getting much thicker. Nor did he notice the second gas grenade that rolled slowly and quietly into the room nearby, the floor blocked from his view by his choice of cover. Not even the quiet vent of more gas alerted him to the impending danger, even as it closed in on him from all sides.

Rick waited patiently for the silhouette of either of his female opponents to pass through the open doorway, his trigger finger itchy with suspense. As more time passed and nothing happened, the cloud of smoke began to disperse as it seeped further into the room. Rather than alert the Rookie to its difference from the previous grenade, it only served to make him dismiss the gas altogether, thinking that its used had been up. He didn't realize that the gas was still there and seeping slowly into his lungs, only now without color or substance.

It wasn't until he felt a giggle bubble from within his chest that he realized something was wrong. The phantom assault was slow to begin and wasn't strong enough to overpower him totally, but as Rick waited for anyone to pass through the door he swore he could feel fingers beginning to crawl up and down his ribs, particularly in back where his lungs were.

Already he began giggling slightly, his grasp on his advanced crossbow becoming infirm and poor. Rick bit his tongue to try to stifle the rising giddiness, but as the sensation continued he found it harder and harder to fight and keep it in. A minute later he began giggling again, and this time wasn't able to stop as he grew louder and louder with time. His grasp on his crossbow was almost completely gone, as he fought with ever fiber of his being to resist the urge to cover himself with his arms.

The sound of footsteps came from the doorway, and Rick realized this might be his last chance to slow them down. If he failed this one, he'd likely be done in for quite a while. With the last ounce of his willpower, he pulled the trigger of his crossbow, shooting a rapid succession of three bolts toward the open doorway before the weapon clattered to the ground.
152322122131112212.title: The Rookie falls for the ruse.

choices: Silva just barely manages to make it to Rick
Rick fires off another bolt, stopping the Huntress in her tracks.
1523221221311122122.content:
One ear pressed to the wall, Silva carefully listened to what was going on in the next room. As soon as she heard boyish giggles start to emerge, a smirk crept up on her lips, knowing that the careless Rookie had fallen to her plan to flush him up. Making sure that her face-mask was sufficiently covering her nose and mouth, the Huntress took a large breath of clean air, holding it in as she turned the corner, walking into the room.

Once inside, she saw what she was looking for. Hunching over a display case that he had been probably using for cover, Rick was now quietly chuckling to himself as he had one arm wrapped around his ribs, trying to swipe away imaginary hands. Already knowing victory was at hand, Silva let her guard down as she walked towards where Rick was, the male giggling too hard to even attempt to run away.

"Oh this is too easy..." Making sure that she was still holding her breath, Silva noticed a small movement to the right of the display. Quickly sidestepping to the right, Silva just barely managed to avoid the barrage of bolts which were Rick's last desperate attempt to stop her from advancing. Smirking inwardly, Silva raised her hand, catching one of the last bolts which Rick had fired, the Rookie's face contorted with a look of panic, disappointment and laughter.

"It looks like that's the end. Time to wrap this up and leave." However, as the Huntress was about to lower her hand to drop the caught bolt, the tip of the projectile quickly opened up to reveal a feather carefully unfurling. Eyes opening wide in surprise, the Huntress barely had anytime to move as a spring loaded mechanism on the feather carried it forward, the tip of it delicately swiping against the thin fabric of her mask which was covering her nose.

Quickly dropping the bolt, Silva clasped her hands to her face. However, the damage had already been done as the Huntress started to feel the beginnings of a sneeze building up in her lungs, much quicker than the giggles that were building up in Rick's. Finally unable to hold the reflex action any longer, Silva let out a short sneeze, followed by the quick intake of the room's gas-filled air.

"That bastard... I didn't expect him to have those sort of bolts. Now its only a matter of time before I... Before I... Eeheheheee!" Chuckling to herself out loud, Silva was already beginning to feel the effects of the Tickle Gas too, the delicate sensation of feathers dusting across the length of her legs already making her knees wobble as she struggled to stand upright, her arms too wrapped around her sides in giggles.

"I just need to make it there... He's breathed this in longer than me, he's definitely in more giggles than me now!" Gritting her teeth amidst her girlish giggling, the iron-will of the Huntress quickly took hold, her legs forcing themselves to move towards Rick as she forged on, determined to be the victor.
1523221221311122122.title: The woman's reflexes save her the bulk of i...

choices: The Rookie gives his pursuer the slip at the very last second.
The Huntress manages to catch him just before he slips away.
The Succubus is immune to the gas and asserts herself.
15232212213111221221.content:
Truth be told, Rick hadn't intended to use any kind of specific type of bolt against the Huntress, nor had he really made any effort to learn what the many different types of bolts were. He wasn't going to test them out on himself after all, and the only one he'd seen in action so far was the one he'd happened to use on the Succubus. So far his almost fated fortunate ability to avoid his two opponents on these lower levels of the tower was more reliant on dumb luck than any real plan. The bolts, the smoke grenades, the dice seemed to be landing all sixes for him.

When the bolt that had been grabbed as it ricocheted off the doorway extended its offending feather, that too was nothing more than dumb luck that once again served the Rookie's cause. As the Huntress, so confident and austere a moment ago, began to choke back the sneeze that would spell her giggly doom, the balance again seemed to tip unfavorably toward the wildly under-informed and under-equipped Rookie.

The one thing that did not go Rick's way was the lack of doom the Huntress faced. Yes, she did indeed breathe in the same gas that she subjected him to, and yes she was beginning to giggle reluctantly as she stumbled toward him. Yet stumble forward she did, toward her opponent who was in worse shape than she.

As for Rick's condition, he was currently trying his hardest to maintain a steady grip on his weapon, an effort that was proving fairly fruitless. The tickles on his ribs meant he was giggling and wobbling too much to keep his hands firmly pointed at the Huntress, no matter how hard he tried to regain his wits. While the effect was temporary and already he was beginning to feel the gas' hysteria subside, it would not be in time before the Huntress was on him.

There was only one thing he could do. Desperately trying to drag the crossbow with him, he too began stumbling, although away from the Huntress deeper into the tower. If he could find a hidden corner to giggle himself free of the gas, he could have another shot at getting the Huntress alone before the Succubus recovered enough to interfere. So far none of the three had submitted, and though Rick's endurance was truly off the charts he did not like his chances were he to be caught by the both of them. Even taking care of one would even the playing field.
15232212213111221221.title: All out of luck.

choices: Rick doubles back to the Art Studio
152322122131112212211.content:
Attempting to control her breathing as much as possible, Silva still giggled through her covered mouth, trying her best to not inhale any more of the tickling-inducing gas than she already had from that one sneeze that the Rookie had made her do, although it was clear to both parties that what Rick had just did was nothing more than a fluke, something that occurred by pure luck.

With each step that she took however, even the Huntress found it harder and harder to forge on, the tickling slowly having more of an effect on her with each passing second. As she finally got to no more than a few feet in front of the giggling Rick, Silva finally was unable to continue on as well, her legs almost about to give way as her previous snickering and chuckling finally blossomed into full fledged giggling, one hand trying to dust away at imaginary feathers dancing across the length of her legs as she held a display case containing a mysterious staff for support.

As the ticklish sensations continued to build up in his adversary, Rick felt the previously poking and prodding fingers dancing across his ribs start to slow down, their digits decreasing. "Thank the gods that didn't last too long. I better get out of here while I still can, before the Huntress regains her composure!" Weakly giggling, he quickly grabbed his crossbow with one hand, turning around as he staggered off into the opposite direction, trying to find another room to get his bearings in.

"H-Hold it! Pffttt... eehehhahaha! I'm telling you to sto-aahhahahaaa!" Dropping down to one knee as her body became imbalanced from her constant chuckling, Silva used whatever strength she had left to lunge forward, one hand wrapping around one of the Rookie's ankles.

"Such a persistent Huntress! Let me go!" Trying to tug his foot out of her grasp, Silva stubbornly refused to let go, even as her giggles became one constant stream pouring out of her mouth from the tickles in her mind. Getting an idea, Rick turned back, bending down. "If you won't let go, then tickle tickle!" One hand preoccupied with holding his crossbow, the Rookie let loose a series of pokes into her sides.

Already feeling giggling from the effects of the gas, Silva was helpless as she squealed in response to the ticklish sensations, each prod like a current of ticklish electricity. As she tried squirm away, Rick dug a finger into the slightly exposed areas of her underarms, wiggling into the sensitive skin in her hollow. Letting out a burst of ticklish laughter, Silva immediately recoiled away, letting go of Rick's ankle in the process as she wrapped her arms around her sides, tumbling to the ground as her legs kicked the air with laughter.

Already knowing that this wouldn't last forever, the Rookie moved his feet, stumbling into the next room with his trusty crossbow in one hand.
152322122131112212211.title: The Rookie gives his pursuer the slip at the ve...

choices: The Huntress recovered quicker than expected and followed him.
The Succubus could tell where he was and avoided the trap.
The Rookie makes a critical mistake that gives himself away.
1523221221311122122112.content:
Once more Rick's luck was pulling him through this incredibly imbalanced matchup against two far better equipped and able contestants. As he fought off the Huntress' dogged pursuit through the tickly gas-filled room, he managed to drag his crossbow and his own sensitive skin through the open door ahead and away from his pursuer.

Rick considered taking advantage of the Huntress' compromising position for a moment, but not only would the gas wear off eventually but the Succubus was no doubt shaking off the effects of her predicament even now. Given that she wasn't exactly human, who knew how the gas would affect her. No, better to keep fighting them one at a time rather than risk running into both at once.

Just then, an idea occurred to Rick. The moment he was out of sight of the Huntress, who was still giggling and stroking at the tickling sensations erupting in small pockets over her body, Rick clamped his mouth shut and sharply changed direction, taking a ninety-degree angle toward the interior of the tower where the bigger and grander rooms were. However, rather than stake out in these massive offerings, he doubled back again toward where he entered the tower, eventually making it back to the room filled with canvas and paints that he'd passed through to escape the Huntress in the first place.

The way his line of thinking went, he figured that the Succubus would've seen which way the Huntress went, and as she would wander in that direction hear the Huntress' giggling. That would lead her inevitably through the painter's gallery. Knowing this, he could spring an ambush as she walked through, once again sending her giggling. He could then take the opportunity to pick off one or the other, tickling them to surrender, and making it a fair one-on-one.

Unfortunately, there wasn't anywhere that screamed good cover to Rick around the gallery. He did, however, have a good angle of the door from behind one large canvas. So he set up behind it, keeping his crossbow ready and peering out from behind the far edge of it, waiting for the Succubus to come through.
1523221221311122122112.title: A risky gamble.

choices: The bolt misses, and Sareth emerges!
The bolt hits, the succubus not expecting it!
15232212213111221221122.content:
As the sound of high heels clacking against the stone floor echoed in the corridor, Rick gulped, knowing that who he was waiting for had arrived. Seeing a feminine shadow just outside the door, Rick aimed his crossbow straight and true, ready to snipe down anything that might come into the artsy room.

As a blur quickly shot into the room, the tell-tale features of wings as well as small horns immediately gave away at which of his two opponents he was facing. Quickly firing off a volley of shots, the Rookie opened his mouth in shock, none of his trap-filled bolts landing on the succubus as she narrowly dodged all of them by mere inches, taking cover behind another large canvas.

"You do know that my sense of hearing and smell is well above those of mortals, right? I could have heard your heavy breathing and giggling from a dozen rooms away." Crossbow still aimed at the thin canvas at which Sareth was hiding behind, Rick was sure that he would get the female demon the next time she came out from behind her cover. "Oh yea, so what? As soon as I nail you with one of these bolts, its game over for the both of you!"

"Oh, we'll see about that." Spying a tin full of paint brushes at one side of the room, Sareth quietly mumbled an incantation as she drew out the magical power within her, granting life to the once lifeless tools. Directing them with one finger, the brushes slowly rose from their holder, floating in mid air as Rick watched, dumbfounded. Gesturing them towards the general location of where the Rookie was, Sareth giggled as her ticklish missiles flew, seeking out their intended target.

Panicking at what the demoness was trying to do even in her trapped corner, Rick had no time to react as the brushes got to work, flying across his whole body as they painted with ticklish strokes, each bristles sending the poor male into another bout of giggles. Even as he tried to shy away from them, they stuck close to his sensitive bare skin, not letting up.

"I have to do something, before I'm the one giggling on the ground first! That canvas doesn't look too thick. If I could just fire a bolt through it, it might hit that devilish succubus!" With a plan in mind already, Rick shakily aimed his crossbow at the other canvas, taking a blind shot at wherever Sareth might be hiding behind it, hoping to hit at least one part of her body with this bolt.
15232212213111221221122.title: The Succubus could tell where he was and avoide...

choices: The Succubus eagerly sashays toward him, daintily kicking the weapon away.
The Succubus leta her paintbrushes work while she recovers the Huntress.
152322122131112212211221.content:
It was such a good plan too. Rick was perfectly hidden from the doorway from which she would enter, the Huntress was preoccupied for a good while, and the it seemed that the crossbow he was using had a large number of uses all of which were highly effective for what he was trying to achieve. Even if it somehow turned out to not be a direct-tickle bolt, no doubt it would cause something else to happen that would tip the scales in his favor again.

Yet for all the good planning, Rick failed to account for the fact that the Succubus Sareth had senses that far exceeded any human's and magic that he didn't know of. So occupied had he been with the Huntress that the Succubus' boast a few rooms earlier had completely slipped his mind, and it would cost him dearly.

The first step in Rick's downfall was when the Succubus sped by without so much as a sweat, knowing exactly where the attacks would be coming from and knowing just how she needed to move to avoid each and every one. Even though her speed was impressive, it was her reflexes to each shot she could hear coming that made it an impossible task to try to hit her, right up until she was blocked from his sight by another canvas.

The second step was something Rick couldn't have predicted even if he tried.

"That's cheat-ihi, dahahahammit!" Rick cried out in protest as he saw the paintbrushes hover out from their hidden pot behind the canvas and fly straight at him like so many ticklish torpedoes, his complaint cut short as the first one struck him right on his wide open and exposed belly. Almost doubling over instantly, Rick's situation only worsened as the rest of the half-dozen paintbrushes danced briskly across his skin, sending him into a mad giggling fit. Vainly he tried to swat as many away as he could with one hand, but each one he batted away offered no respite against the other five, and even the ones he struck returned quickly.

Sensing his imminent vulnerability, Rick gathered what remained of his willpower and focused it into raising the crossbow he held for one last shot. The canvases may have been good obstructions to his vision, but they were too thin to stop anything with even a moderate amount of force. He didn't have the Succubus' senses, but a lucky shot could save him once again.

However, two things doomed his effort to failure. Not only had he forgotten about the Succubus' ability to hear so well, but as he was about to pull the trigger a brush flew up and began painting the underarm that was used to steady the crossbow.

With a laugh, Rick dropped his arm and the trajectory of the shot plummeted, missing where the Succubus had been a moment before. She herself had dashed out from cover at the same time, further avoiding the desperate shot. Defeated, the boy's tickled arms dropped the bow, which resounded on the floor with a loud clatter. It appeared that there was little he could do to outwit his opponents in his current state, and would have to wait and hope his endurance gave him another shot.
152322122131112212211221.title: A blind shot in the dark.

choices: Rick hears an argument coming from the the other rooms
Rick hears the sound of feet, he has to hide!
1523221221311122122112212.content:
"It seems someone can't handle my little pets." Walking out from her cover, Sareth cooed as she petted one of the floating brushes with affection, much like how one might pet a dog. Still rolling about on the ground in a fit of ticklish laughter, Rick could barely hold his own against the constant dipping and stroking of the un relenting bristles, laughing even more as the succubus sent the last brush back into the fray, playfully swishing against the edges of his naval.

"Now I would love to tickle you, but I wonder what happened to my dear partner. You wouldn't happen to know, would you?" Goosing Rick's sides with her fingers, the Rookie let out a boyish yelp, before buckling back into laughter. "Oh never mind. I'll just have to go by my ears then. Meanwhile, my lovely toys will keep you company. I wonder if that annoying woman is still laughing. Maybe I can sneak in a few 'accidental' tickles..." Giggling evilly to herself, Sareth walked towards the door, about to find her partner. "Try not to move away, would you? I'll just be back in a few minutes. And then I'll really tickle you.

Giving Rick a sly wink as she strutted away, Rick could barely even do anything, tears welling up in the corners of his eyes as the brushes danced across his upper-body, toying around in his ticklish hollows and sensitive sides. Finally after what seemed like an eternity, the brushes slowly stopped stroking as they fell lifelessly back to the floor, rolling and clattering. Huffing and gasping for deep breaths of air, Rick slowly sat up, getting his bearings.

"If that nasty magic wielding demoness comes back with the Huntress..." Gulping, Rick didn't know how much time had passed since he had been giggling, so he had no way of knowing whether Sareth had been successful in rescuing her partner. Gingerly picking up his crossbow which had been accidentally dropped onto the floor due to him being tickled to tears by the painting tools, Rick quickly tried to think of a plan.

"Maybe I can hide in one of the nearby rooms... Or should I go deeper into the tower... Maybe I can find more tickle tools or equipment like this amazing crossbow inside..." As he continued to ponder, the Rookie suddenly heard some sounds coming from the corridor...
1523221221311122122112212.title: The Succubus leta her paintbrushes work while s...

choices: The Succubus hears him in the room and sends her brushes to flush him out.
The Huntress notices the knocked over supplies and pushes the shelf over.
The Rookie calms himself enough to be passed over and escape.
15232212213111221221122122.content:
It was a long and torturous ordeal that wore Rick down considerably. While not nearly as relentless as either of his opponents would likely turn out to be, the brushes acted teasingly and knowingly as if they had a collective mind of their own. The way they would play with him, making him wiggle and thrash just where they wanted to and always in a way that exposed another part they wanted to play with, it was as if the Succubus' nature had somehow inhabited them for a short while.

Slowly, though, they began to lose their energy, and as one by one they dropped to the ground with their magic no longer animating them, it became easier and easier for Rick to breathe and recover a little of his lost endurance. It took a bit, but he managed to get himself under control, snatching the last brush weakly trying to tickle his thighs and letting it drop lifeless to the ground.

Easing himself back onto his feet, Rick stooped and picked up the crossbow he'd dropped earlier, glad that the Succubus hadn't though to remove his only true companion in this nightmarish two-on-one scenario. After all that the weapon had seen him through, he was beginning to feel more than a little attached to it (even though he did feel a little betrayed after that last showing). He cycled through the settings on it to make sure it was still functional, and even took some time to aim down its sights so that it felt comfortable to him again. With the crossbow back in his grip, he felt a lot more confident.

Just as he was debating with himself whether or not he should double back again or delve deeper into the tower however, Rick heard the telltale footsteps and bickering voices of his opponents grow closer through the long corridors. Desperately looking around for somewhere to hide, he saw a perfect looking shelf of paints (edible, unbeknownst to him).

Quickly he tiptoed over to the shelf, accidentally knocking over some supplies as he did so, before standing in front of the wooden furniture and keeping it between himself and the door. Not only was it sturdier than the flimsy canvas, but it was also something different than what the Succubus had seen him hiding behind before. Any little bit to throw off his opponents. Unfortunately, it didn't give him a good angle of the rest of the room from which he could see and fire from. The best he could do was steady his breathing as much as he could and hope that they'd move on.
15232212213111221221122122.title: Cat and Mouse

choices: They split up, one of them staying behind in the art room.
Rick manages to escape amidst confusion as they 'painted' each other.
152322122131112212211221222.content:
"...I come to rescue you, and this is all the 'gratitude' I receive, Huntress? I should have left you giggling on the floor just now."

"Maybe you should, seeing as you left him alone, able to escape! You even left him his weapon! Now we have to find him again, in this stupidly over sized tickle tower. Who knows, maybe next time you'll be the one on the ground from one of his tricks."

"Is that a threat I hear, my dear Silva?"

"Whatever, let's just find him again." As the both of them entered the room just like Rick had anticipated, the Rookie held his breath behind the shelf, aware that even the slightest sound might give him away. And if he was found out... His endurance would surely be tested this time by the Huntress and a succubus extremely skilled in the arts of making men scream with laughter.

"How do you know he's still where I left him? For all we know, he could have ran away into the other rooms already. And my flying brushes won't work unless I am able to see the initial target, so no use finding him with those. See, theres no one here anymore!" Something catching the corner of her eye, Silva walked over to the paint shelf where Rick was hiding, the Rookie on the other side, praying that the keen Huntress wouldn't have picked up his trail. Kneeling down the knocked-over paint cans as she dipped one finger into the spilt paint, Silva contemplated as Sareth waited impatiently behind her, one foot tapping against the ground.

"Are you quite done playing artist, Huntress? Or did you forget that we have a ticklish male to find." Bringing her finger close to her nose, Silva gave it a sniff, quickly connecting the dots. "Oh, he's close by alright. This paint's still very fresh. In fact, if he's not in one of the other rooms nearby, he could very well be in this room... Judging from the freshness of the paint, which hasn't dried up..." Giving the shelf a hard shove, it tilted backwards, paint supplies clattering eerily as the shelf knocked against the wall. "Hmmm... Not here..." Unbeknownst to her, the Rookie's hard was beating furiously behind the shelf which she had just knocked, thanking the heavens that it didn't fall completely and expose him.

As Silva continued to think of the possible things that Rick might do, oblivious to anything else, she didn't notice that Sareth's childlike patience had almost hit it's limit. As she saw a discarded paintbrush on the floor, as well as a can of fresh red paint on a short table, Sareth suddenly had a mischievous idea. Retrieving the tool, Sareth grinned as she dipped the brush into the paint, slowly tip-toeing over to where Silva was.

"Say... Actually, I do know a way to find Rick. Although if you really want to use it is another matter..." Whipping around, Silva already wanted to know what method her partner had up her sleeves, unaware of the smirk at the corners of Sareth's mouth. "Really, then what are you waiting for? If it helps us to find him, then by all means, go ahead."

Shrugging her shoulders, feigning nonchalance, Sareth walked towards where Silva was. "Sure, all I have to do is to transcribe a rune of translocation using this brush, and we'll be able to find him." Initially for the idea, Silva started to be a little cautious as the succubus suddenly started to unzip the front of her vest, up to where her ribs were. "W-Wait, I thought you said we just had to write a rune down?"

"Why yes of course. But you see, this spell requires it to be written on someone who is an enemy of the one we are trying to find, so... Try not to move so much, would you?" As Sareth began to draw a large red spiral onto the Huntress' bare belly, Silva instinctively sucked her tummy in, gritting her teeth against the giggles.

"Come on, try to to move so much. If I make a single mistake, we'll have to start over." Struggling to nod her head in acknowledgement, Silva braced herself as she felt the bristles glide themselves across her side, belly and ribs. As the brushes dipped into her underarms, she let out a yelp. glancing at the demoness. However, as soon as she saw the grin on Sareth's face, she quickly knew that she had been fooled.

"Location spell my arse, you're just having fun painting me red! Well, two can play at that game!" Grabbing a large canvas brush from a bucket of green paint, Silva quickly swiped it across Sareth's belly, sending the succubus into a flurry of giggles from the sudden attack.

As the both of them continued to attack each other with the green and red paint-covered brushes...
152322122131112212211221222.title: The Huntress notices the knocked over supplies ...

choices: The team snap out of their fight quickly and catch up to him.
The team are delayed and follow his trail to where he's hiding.
1523221221311122122112212222.content:
From behind the shelf, Rick kept his eyes clothes and tried his hardest to steady his breathing and heart rate, focusing so much on his meditation that even the words taking place just on the other side of the shelf were beginning to lose their meaning as his focus was directed inward. He achieved quite a bit with his attempts, calming himself to a reasonable heart rate and slowing his shallow breaths to where even he couldn't hear them.

All that work was undone in an instant as a crashing noise resounded about every corner of the gallery. The Huntress had just knocked over the shelf of paints behind which Rick was hiding, thinking that she'd disproved a hunch she had when nothing emerged. In reality, what had happened that Rick didn't even know the shelf was falling until he opened his eyes and saw it rushing towards him. Like a deer caught in the headlights, there was nothing he could do but drop backwards, landing on his bare bum with nearly a heart attack as his crossbow clattered to the ground beside him.

When the noise had ended, Rick's breathing had been pushed completely out of control and his heart rate jumped back up to a mile a minute, and there wouldn't have been enough time for him to wrestle it back down until his body stopped panicking. Fortunately for him, he didn't have to thanks to the Succubus' impatience. Giggling could be heard on the other side of the tilted shelf, and - though still on edge - the Rookie knew what that meant.

Peering out delicately from behind the toppled cover, Rick saw the Succubus facing away from him as the Huntress' eyes were closed in fighting off the rising giggles. He saw an opportunity to escape, one he took without hesitation. He reached out to the side and picked up the crossbow he'd dropped, carefully hoisting it in his hands and gingerly stepping along the edge of the room. He made sure to remain well out of vision of the Succubus, and the Succubus made sure that the Huntress couldn't see him as he made his way around the two toward a door that led deeper into the tower.

He reached the door, relieved and reassured, before quickly and quietly darting away in his socked feet, which made little noise on the floor of the rooms. Even as he dashed away, however, he made another error. The rough treatment of the tilted shelf had spilled many paints onto the floor, and Rick had accidentally stepped in a large puddle with both feet on his way out. While he couldn't feel them through his socks, the impressions they left behind were easy to track.

That escaped Rick's attention as he dashed deeper into the tower, keeping his eyes open for an advantageous position or a new tool he could use to his advantage. He didn't want to push his luck, but he felt fairly confident that he could rely on his opponents being distracted long enough to give him some time to look around.
1523221221311122122112212222.title: A House Divided

choices: Rick tricked them as he used backtracking to get behind them!
Rick at the other end, looking at mysterious switches on the wall.
15232212213111221221122122222.content:
Giggling as she swatted away Silva's green paintbrush, Sareth's eyes opened wide as she spotted something along the entrance of the door. As the Huntress saw the change in expression on her partner's facade, Silva turned her head to look too. Grinning, Silva quickly threw away her brush as she squatted down the inspect the newly formed footprints made out of blue paint which definitely weren't there the last time they checked.

"Extremely fresh too... And a male's too... He might have gotten away from us right under our noses. See what you did. He was probably hiding somewhere in this room, waiting for us to be distracted while he made his get-away. If you hadn't lost your patience and actually used your head, he would be caught by the both of us by now." Sighing with regret, Silva stood up again, zipping us her vest, not caring about the various red patterns which Sareth had so 'delicately' painted on her.

"And you're blaming me for all this? Well excuse me, if I recall, you decided to have your fun too. It takes too hands to tickle, after all." Giving the Huntress another poke to her side, she was rewarded with a flinch and a frosty glare from the other party. "Don't blow your top, Huntress. If we just follow where these foot prints lead to, we'll definitely find where he went."

Crossing her arms under her chest in silent resentment, both women hastily exited the room as they did as Sareth suggested, following the path of Rick's footprints. A tense atmosphere in the air as they climbed down a set of stairs along with the bright blue footprints, they found themselves at the start of a long corridor. Looking up, they saw...
15232212213111221221122122222.title: The team are delayed and follow his trail to wh...

choices: Either the Seductress or the Huntress catches up to him through the hall.
Both of them find a way around the darts and trap him.
Neither want to rush it, allowing Rick to drop his weapon and start climbing.
152322122131112212211221222222.content:
At the far end of the corridor stood Rick, still with nothing but a jock strap and a strange crossbow gadget. He was poring over an entire control panel of switches that was poorly labeled to the point of being illegible, perhaps intentionally. "I shouldn't be wasting my time here," he said aloud, trying to convince himself that it wasn't worth it. He couldn't help but remain, though, enticed by the prospect of laying a trap for his pursuers.

"I'm going to regret this."

The other reason why Rick was so enticed by the wall panel was because, beyond that, it was just a catwalk. He could see a door at the far end of it, and beneath the catwalk was probably a whole theater's worth of ropes and wires connecting who knew what, but the door was far and the wires were an unreliable escape. So the solo contestant decided to take his chances with the panel.

He was still standing there studying it, trying to make sense of the seemingly illogical symbols marking each lever when the pair of predators rounded the corner and caught him in their sights. Doing a quick double-take, Rick grit his teeth and turned back to the panel, resorting to playing eenie-meenie-miney-mo to make a decision. There wasn't enough time to make a run for it at this point, they were too close and he was too far from the door. So all he could do was pray as he slammed down several different levers, hoping for the best.

A number of things happened at once. Most noticeably, the hall behind Rick began shooting feather darts from the walls in irregular patterns, making it difficult to traverse. The catwalk also retracted, leaving him trapped with the dangerous duo. Then the wires started moving about, some rising and falling while others started tightening.

Frozen with indecision, Rick just stared down at the wires below. It would mean leaving behind his weapon, which he was loathe to do. But there was nowhere else to go.
152322122131112212211221222222.title: Indecision

choices: Rick fires one more bolt to seal the deal!
Rick decides it isn't worth the risk, and starts to escape!
Silva manages to make it through, despite the distractions!
1523221221311122122112212222221.content:
“It seems like our tickle toy has finally cornered himself. Of all the tiring physical activities… Sigh, I’ll leave you to bring him back, my dear Silva. I have no taste for such obstacles.” Stepping forward, the Huntress observed the movements of the several darts firing between the walls of the corridor separating her from her prey. “Oh don’t worry. This is child’s play for a hunter of my caliber. I’ll have him back before you can even say ‘Laughing Boy’.”

Keeping a close watch on the pattern of emerging darts, the Huntress smoothly stepped into the hail of darts, each with enough poison to leave a grown man in hysterics for over an hour. Nimbly ducking and weaving in between the minuscule gaps of free space, a hand shot out to flick away a dart that was about to make contact with her naked skin, never losing her concentration for a second.

Panicking as he saw his opponent slowly but surely making ground against the storm of darts he had unwittingly unleashed, Rick knew he had to stop the Huntress in her tracks, before she reached where he was with only the option to climb the ropes left, and he had a sinking feeling she wouldn’t let him do that. As his hand nervously fingered his crossbow, an idea came into his head, the intense look of concentration on the Huntress’ face giving away the hint he needed.

Taking another step forward, Silva barely shifted her hips to the side as a crossbow bolt whizzed past her. Clicking her tongue at the added obstacle of having to dodge a projectile coming from a different direction from the rest, Silva pushed forth, now at a snail’s pace as she took precaution at the random crossbow belt fired every once in a while at her way.

“If you think another bolt will stop me… Let me show you how sharp my senses are!” Gritting her teeth, Silva caught another bolt between her thumb and index finger, quickly flicking it towards Rick before moving to dodge another hail of darts. Having the advantage of seeing his opponent’s movements clearly, Rick still barely managed to duck as the dart sped just above his head, disappearing into the void of moving ropes behind him. “If I can’t hit you with conventional means… What if I do this…”

As the glint of another crossbow bolt entered her field of vision, Silva laughed as it bounced off the wall, completely missing its target by a meter. “What’s wrong? Can’t even aim a simple-urk!” Gasping as she felt something sting her rear, the Huntress quickly pulled it out, a tickle bolt in her hands. “Ricocheting the bolt on the wall-! Damn! Not when I’m so… close-eeheheeeheee! Not now!” As her movements became more sluggish, giggles slowing down her reaction time even as she was only a few steps away from her quarry…
1523221221311122122112212222221.title: Either the Seductress or the Huntress catches u...

choices: The Huntress took the crossbow and shot Rick with expert aim.
The Seductress used her superhuman qualities to catch Rick.
The wires began rising and twisting, tangling Rick and bringing him up.
15232212213111221221122122222212.content:
With the quickly approaching Huntress, an aptly named contestant if ever there was one, Rick knew that his window for escape was growing smaller by the second. It wasn't as if his way out was a clean catwalk or a simple slide either, he would have to consciously maneuver his way down through the web of dangling ropes and wires, none of which made a simple ladder for him to climb down.

Not to mention that simply standing here was a hazard, as Rick was promptly reminded as another redirected dart was flung his way, which he narrowly managed to avoid by crouching next to the wall. No, staying here was not a good idea.

So it was with great reluctance that the Rookie dropped his trusty crossbow, which had seen him through so much, and flipped over the lip of the balcony and began to climb down. He hung from the edge for a moment while he found purchase for his feet, which came in the form of a lateral line that his toes just manage to grab. From there, he move his grip to one of the vertical wires, one hand at a time, before wrapping that same wire around his ankle so that he wouldn't just fall. Once there, he started slowly making his way down into the abyss below, not entirely sure where it would lead him.

Almost a minute later, as Rick reached the end of the wire and began transferring to another, he heard from above the sound of a loud clank and, more frighteningly, the absence of the buzzing darts that had filled the hallway mere moments ago. The Huntress must have found the switch that turned off the darts in the hallway.

Knowing that time was of the essence, Rick sped his descent, making sloppy movements that actually cost him precious seconds in his panic to hurry away.
15232212213111221221122122222212.title: Discretion, the better part of valor

choices: Rick caused the succubus to trip!
Sareth manages to trap Rick in the ropes!
Rick reaches the floor below and gets a running start!
152322122131112212211221222222122.content:
Giggling softly to herself as she had one arm wrapped around the lever that disabled the dart trap behind her, Silva clumsily leaned on the wall as the crossbow’s effects still had her in its grip, the occasional twitching of her hips a dead give-away to anyone of the lingering tickling sensations.

Reaching out a trembling hand to use the crossbow that the male had left behind to at least try to shoot him down from the ropes, a pale foot suddenly entered her field off vision, a swift kick sending the weapon careening into the abyss below as it dropped past Rick, the latter already feeling hopeful that at least he wouldn’t have to dodge any bolts while climbing downwards. “Oops, did you want to use that? With all that laughing you’re doing, why don’t you leave the rest to me?”

About to argue with her partner, the sensation of small things poking into her skin already gave Silva a sneaking suspicion of what Sareth had just pricked her with. “Oh, and I retrieved these for you. Now why don’t you stay here like a good girl while I retrieve our tickly toy.” Collapsing to the ground in hysterical laughter now as the Huntress clumsily tried to pull out the various darts stuck on her body, Sareth stretched her limbs before vaulting over the ledge.

Landing with grace onto the narrow ropes with both of her feet, the succubus held out her hands for balance before sliding down the ropes, her arms occasionally reached out to support her weight, swinging like someone who had spent a lifetime in the jungle. Skillfully twirling her body to adjust her weight, she quickly spotted her quarry, a predatory grin on her lips.

Already feeling the slight vibrations of ropes connecting to the ones he was currently on, Rick hastened his pace into the darkness below, hoping that wherever it lead to would quickly appear. Risking a glance up at the nimble demoness descending down towards him…
152322122131112212211221222222122.title: The Seductress used her superhuman qualities to...

choices: Sareth tangles up the rest of Rick.
Sareth brings Rick back to the platform.
1523221221311122122112212222221222.content:
Knowing full well that the pursuers couldn't be far behind, Rick tried his hardest to descend as quickly as he could. The problem was with the consistency of the wire; it was simply too rough for him to slide down quickly without subjecting his bare skin to an incredibly painful amount of rope-burn. He did move away from simply inching his way down, however, positioning himself so that he could drop hand over hand and use gravity to speed his descent, rather than halt every step.

From above, the Rookie heard a clattering noise, drawing his attention upward. Moments later he swung himself to the side in order to avoid the crossbow falling rapidly into the abyss below, his heart pounding in his chest as he clutched the swinging rope. Any slower and he would've been brained by it, possibly losing his grip and hurtling after the discarded tool.

Who's crazy enough to throw that in after me? he wondered to himself as he sighed a tense breath of relief, dangling from the vertical wire and trying to calm his racing heart.

His resolve returned quickly. The platform from which he started wasn't too far away, and if the weapon had been thrown from there then someone must be close behind him. He had to start moving again, and quickly, although that was easier said than done on the swinging wire. It felt unstable, as if no grip would be tight enough to keep him from falling. Rather than waste precious time, though, Rick braved the swinging instability to put at least a little more distance between himself and his pursuers.

All of a sudden, all too suddenly really, the swinging stopped.

It jolted Rick and caught him completely off guard. His hands slipped from the wire, but thankfully there was lateral rope nearby that caught him as he fell forward, bracing against his chest as he stared into the dark abyss below. With quick reactions, he grabbed onto it and held fast, not wanting to fall and find out how well the safety precautions of the arena were.

Surprisingly, his feet didn't fall. He could feel himself hanging from his left leg, his right dangling toward the darkness below. A quick look back revealed that the wire he had wrapped around it to keep from falling had tangled it lightly, making a complete circuit around his ankle that kept him from relying entirely on the one wire for support. It would be simple to dislodge, if not for the other thing he saw.

Rick's eyes widened as more wires began drifting toward him at an alarming rate. What was going on? It must be his pursuers! Quickly he brought up his right foot to try to kick away some of the encroaching wires, but that did little other than make them swing back and forth, still growing closer. When that didn't work out, he tried to use his right foot to loosen the wire currently wrapped around his left ankle, but in his panic he just couldn't slip his toe in to loosen the loop. By the time it had fit, the wires were already beginning to entwine both his legs.

"No, no!" he yelled, trying to struggle and break free, only worsening his predicament and endangering his precarious position on the lateral line. His hand slipped again, and his attention suddenly refocused as he grabbed it quickly. By the time he turned back, it was too late: his feet had disappeared in a web of wires.

Just then, a pair of dainty feet landed gently on the backs of his thighs, nearly weightless.
1523221221311122122112212222221222.title: In Too Deep

choices: The Huntress slips up as she descends, trapping them all in the ropes!
The Huntress slips up as she descends, sending all of them plummeting!
One of the two females gets entangled along with Rick!
15232212213111221221122122222212223.content:
“Mhmm… Watching you squirm… It really does rile up my appetite, you know?” Licking her lips at finally having her turn with Rick, Sareth slowly traced a finger up the male’s exposed back, sending a shiver done his spine as he tried his best to move his legs out of the web of strings entangling them.

“Tsk tsk. You should really just give in and surrender to me. The more you wriggle around, the tighter those ropes are going to get.” Upon realizing the logic behind those words, Rick quickly stopped moving, his breath held in his chest as the swinging of the ropes finally slowed down, the tightness around his legs beginning to slacken.

However, the succubus giggled, clearly having other plans in mind for the trapped Rookie. “But don’t worry; even if you didn’t want to move those hips, I have just the thing to make you move those hips. ” Feeling two soft orbs start to press against his back, Rick’s body reluctantly started to squirm again for more reasons than one, the feeling of nails drawling closer and closer towards his naval already proving unbelievably ticklish.

“C-Can’t you let me go? Maybe we can strike a deal?” Giving a haughty laugh, Sareth wiggled a finger in his pelvis, causing him to splutter in giggles. “For one, if I were to do that, I’m not sure what my little Silva might do to me when I go back to her empty handed. Secondly, how could I ever let such a ticklish… little… thing… like you out of my grasp? No no no… What you shouldn’t be doing is talking…”

Slipping a hand inside his jock strap, Rick gasped as the tortuous teasing began, the ticklish pleasure starting to build up in the back of his mind. “No… What I want you do is laugh for me, you ticklish thing. Beg and moan for your new mistress’ touch!” Already squirming his neck away from the husky breath in his ear whispering sweet teasing words, Rick’s lower half buckled along with Sareth’s hands, her expert ministrations in pleasing a male quickly taking its toll on his endurance.

“Coochie… Coochie… Coo! Does this ticklish rookie have a ticklish pickle as well? Fufufu... The longer it gets, the more room I have to tickle!” Feeling his now aroused shaft getting harder inside the jock strap, its confines started to get unbearably tight with Sareth’s finger exploring inside it as well. Exploding into boyish laughter and giggles, Sareth cooed, delighted at his reaction.

“Ge-eeheheheeet off of me! Hahahaaahaa!” Twisting his head to get a better view of the succubus atop him, Rick saw what she could not, a shadow descending from the top of the balcony as well. Noticing him distracted, Sareth tickled a little faster, causing his laughter to raise an octave. “What are you looking at, you ticklish thing? Are my skills not pleasing enough for you?” Moaning in laughter with another stroke of her fingers…
15232212213111221221122122222212223.title: Sareth enjoys herself a little.
