152322122131112212211221222222122231.content:
What started as gritted teeth and a furrowed brow quickly became a reluctant smile and a wiggle of the hips. That then turned slowly into giggles coughed out against an effort to resist, which slowly became giggles and wiggles as time passed. It wasn't long until there was loud cackling in the empty shaft accompanying the struggles, the boyish laughter that was now occupying everyone's ears.

All this from a single finger inside a jock strap.

"Plehehehease! STAHAP!" Rick laughed loudly as he tried to turn and face the sadistic demoness, his neck struggling to bear the weight of his laughing head while turning. What he saw when he looked up made his stomach sink. Sareth didn't seem to notice, redoubling her efforts to make him laugh, but even as he did that was the least of his worries.

Seconds later, Rick felt it: the impact of the Huntress, perhaps tripped or distracted, colliding with the two of them already on the ropes. Fortunately it was the Succubus that bore the brunt of the impact, not Rick's poor stretched out back. Still, things weren't looking good.

The collision had sent the two women off in different directions, each then interfering with the ropes that held Rick where he was. For a brief moment there was hope, feeling the ropes loosen, but as the women's momentum kept them swinging it became apparent that it wouldn't end well. Because Rick's head was inclined to face down, he couldn't see exactly how it happened, but the result was just the same. Not only had his arms been grabbed and pulled out in front of him, leaving him dangling from ankle and wrist, but the women had been tangled up in their own mess. He could tell because he felt both of them lying on his back, one between his shoulders and the other on his thighs, and with a mess of ropes interspersed among both of them.

"Great going, girls," the Rookie said, rolling his eyes. "Now we're all stuck here. Should've taken my offer when you had the chance, you demon."

Unluckily for Rick, and unbeknownst to him, the fact that he was on the bottom of the whole pile meant that he was the load-bearer. If he could shake himself free, then all of them would fall past the ropes. It was obvious from the team's perspective, but poor Rick had yet to find out.
152322122131112212211221222222122231.title: Clumsy

choices: Rick shifts his shoulders, causing the Huntress to fall off!
Rick shifts his legs, causing Sareth to slip down!
The fighting females cause all of them to fall!
1523221221311122122112212222221222311.content:
Lying on the back of Rick’s rough shoulders, Silva tugged at the ropes wrapped around the length of her body, some of time tied around her hands and legs, keeping her from escaping. Meanwhile, Sareth was testing her own bonds, the male feeling the sensation of the smooth skin of her back lightly bouncing on the back of his legs. Clicking her tongue in annoyance after a few minutes, the succubus laid slack, taunting her partner. “Well good going, huntress. If you had just waited a few more minutes, I would have him squirming in our fingertips.”

“Well, if someone hadn’t jumped down and waited for me like any sane person would, we wouldn’t be in this mess.” Trying to force her way out with brute strength, Silva only managed to get herself more entangled between the multitudes of ropes. “Instead of blaming me, why don’t you find a way to get us out of here, so we can tickle Mr Jock-strap underneath us?” A shade of red on his cheeks at being called that nickname, Rick merely waited, hoping that a miracle would save him.

And indeed a miracle came, in the form of a rather annoyed and bored succubus. As the huntress was distracted with thoughts on extracting herself out of this rather ‘sticky’ situation, Sareth pulled one of her feet which had been wrapped with ropes towards her without the former’s knowledge, a mischievous smile already on her lips and fingers wiggling in anticipation. “Such impatience… Impatient girls must be punished, should they not?”

“Well yes, impatience is a bad thing but-eehheeheeehee!” Bursting into laughter at the feeling of nails stroking along her naked arches, Silva barely craned her neck to see Sareth, giggling to herself as she laid stroke after stroke upon the huntress’ bare foot. Seeing her partner struggle wildly as she tried to escape in vain, Sareth continued her ministrations, clearly amused by her reactions. “Next time, you’ll leave it to me, won’t you? Or will these poor tootsies suffer for you to be convinced?”

Not one to take it lying down, the Huntress stretched out, reaching as far as she could with her free hand. Grabbing onto Sareth’s pale sides with an iron-like grip, Silva proceeded to squeeze with vicious abandon to the chagrin of the surprised succubus, who let out feminine laughter of her own, wiggling about on the spot.

Already feeling the annoyingly ticklish sensation of Silva’s hair lightly dragging across the back of his neck, Rick now had to endure the wiggling and grinding of Sareth’s hips into his own, not making for a comfortable situation at all. What’s worst, it almost seemed like it had a mind of its own as he felt Sareth’s own tail crawl underneath him, now dancing across his bare belly in haphazard strokes. Starting to hear his laughter slowly getting mixed into the cacophony of female laughter…

152331.content:
Already seeing a familiar face, both the Huntress and the Succubus (what is usually thought to be an odd combination of contenders) entered the larger-than-usual arena that has been prepared just for ticklish combat between five contenders. As the cheers of the crowd started up from the stands, Silva eyed the Tickle Witch coming from one of the doors, her past experiences of fighting her slowly coming back to her, and unlike last time, the person coming in with her seemed to be a Female Tiger... A cross between a regular tiger and human perhaps?

"What's wrong Silva, are you scared of the wittle tickle witch? If she's too tough for you, just say so." Giggling to herself as she taunted Silva, Sareth eyed the last contender entering through a third door at the side of the arena, a male wearing nothing but a jockstrap confidently striding forward, his head held high.

"If anything, I guess that one has a monstrous level of endurance to tickling, seeing as he came in nothing but a loin cloth." Nodding as she agreed with her partner's sentiment, Silva squinted her eyes, cautiously watching Rick, who at first glance might seem the easiest contestant, but there might be a chance of him being the dark horse of this tournament.
152331.title: Fight!

choices: Kareesa and Crystal enter the arena too!
1523311.content:
Rick didn't like his odds. He'd been told that he'd do fine, that this kind of fighting often turned out well for the underdog, but that didn't make Rick feel any better as he emerged into the coliseum with his head swiveling around, absorbing the massive crowd and enormous stadium. Such a new and unprecedented sight momentarily distracted the young, easily impressed man as he took a moment to just look around. He snapped out of it eventually, though, and quickly looked around at who he would be competing with.

A three-way this time, but he was alone while his opponents were in teams. The fact that four of the five people in the coliseum were against Rick didn't bode well for him, but upon reflection that might be a blessing in disguise. Two teams of two and one team of one - the teams of two were obviously the bigger threat. If they tried to fight each other, then perhaps Rick could pick them off one by one and snag away a victory. The more he thought, the more he liked that idea, not realizing that each team could just send one of their members to take care of him while the others fought.

With a great deal more confidence than his previous engagements, he even managed to smile as he looked around, taking a look at his competition.
1523311.title: The Rookie comes forth, ready to tickle!

choices: Huntress and Succubus go for the tower
The pair attacks the other girls
The pair goes after the solo
15233111.content:
Kareesa stepped out first, sucking up the cheers of the crowd. Even the lude whistles were pleasing to her ears. She flaunted her body a bit before looking to her partner. Well. Partner for now that is.

Crystal grinned and strided out happily. She swing her hips as she walked. Without warning, she gave her partner a small tickle on her torso. It was obvious that Crystal was going to torment her if they were the last two. But obviously there were other issues. Three of them. And only one was familiar.
15233111.title: Kareesa and Crystal enter the arena too!

choices: Rick makes his choice before the other pair of girls!
152331111.content:
"Hmmph, they can fight all they want, all three of them by themselves. If you want to join them, by all means, go ahead. Because I'm not sticking around for this little tickle-fest." Already getting a head start, Sareth ran into the tower nearby, entering the large doorway as she disappeared into it.

"Even though I hate to agree with you, it might be in our favor to wait till the odds have evened out a little. Maybe they'll even tickle each other till theres only one for them for us to have fun with." Following her partner's route, Silva looked back as she saw the rest of the contestants looking their way, unsure looks in all their eyes.

"Will they stay to fight it out, or will they chase after us. And I do love the thrill of a hunt." Knowing that the dark tower would be well suited to her needs, Silva disappeared inside as well, leaving both the other female team and Rick eyeing each other up, as well as the tower to their side, unsure as to whether it was safe to enter.
152331111.title: Huntress and Succubus go for the tower

choices: The final pair make their plan.
1523311111.content:
Already Rick's plan was falling apart. His confidence fell and his smile faltered as he watched the more devious looking pair enter the tower in the middle of the coliseum, leaving him alone with the other team. Even though they didn't look quite as intimidating, two on one were still terrible odds. He didn't think he'd do well against them.

Perhaps he could taunt the pair in the tower back out of it? That seemed like a good idea, but only at first. Out here was nothing but open sand and the dulled spikes of the walls, nowhere for Rick to hide and try to lose someone other than just outrunning them. In an engagement, that would be his best bet.

So quickly and quietly he dashed toward the tower in the middle, slowing as he neared it and scanning the last team and seeing if they would follow. He made sure to enter the tower from his side, far from where the other teams would go in. That would be his best bet. He slunk into the tower and ducked behind the doorway.
1523311111.title: The Rookie slinks toward the tower.

15233111111.content:
Crystal and Kareesa knew what weapons they wanted. So no doubt they'd head for the tower as well. But they weren't staying in there. Get in, get the weapons, get out. Simple as that.

Hurriedly they sprinted into the tower and grinned. Crystal grabbed he dual wield tickle pistols while Kareesa grabbed a feather duster and a belt of tickle grenades. Both of them nodded and made a run for the exit.
15233111111.title: The final pair make their plan.

choices: He decides to side with Silva and Sareth
He decides to fight with Crystal and Kareesa
152331111111.content:
"And did you really think that you were the only ones who knew about the tickle weapons in this tower?" As both Crystal and Kareesa gulped, both Silva and Sareth stepped out of the shadows near the entrance, blocking their exit. Looking at them both, the other pair had managed to procure weapons similar in purpose as to Crystal's tickle pistols and Kareesa's duster as well as explosives, Silva grabbing herself a pouch full of tickle shurikens while Sareth had gloves on both of her hands, feathers extending out from their fingertips.

"How about you give up quietly, and we won't leave you a giggling mess for everyone to watch." Flourishing three shurikens seemingly out of nowhere in one hand, Silva got ready as Sareth waggled a finger, taunting them to come. "And just for the record, this is a free-for-all."

As Crystal gripped her pistols even more tightly, Kareesa slowly reached behind her, gingerly fingering one of the many ticklish explosive devices on her belt, both of them ready for what the other duo might try.

As the two pairs stood in a Mexican style standoff, the last contender was slowly making his way through the first floor of the tower, coming closer as he brandished his procured weapon, ready to strike...
152331111111.title: They are cut off!

choices: The bolt collides with the Tigress.
The bolt collides with the Witch.
1523311111112.content:
When Rick entered the tower, he was only expecting there to be a series of rooms and perhaps props he could hide within. He was totally unprepared for the arsenal of tools therein. Fortunately, it appeared that he'd entered a part of the tower that was reasonably distant from where the other two teams had found themselves, as he couldn't see anyone else.

This gave him time to look around and inspect (as well as he could, at least) all the various devices available. He had no idea what they did, but he did have the vague idea that they were meant to be used to help him fight the other contestants. From weapon rack to weapon rack he walked, looking at each one and even holding a few to see how they felt. Some were too big, others didn't feel right, and there was one that looked like a lasso that he couldn't even figure out how to use. Good thing there was so many, so Rick could afford to be picky.

What he eventually settled on was basically a repeater crossbow, except with bolts that seemed to have suction cups rather than points. Looking around on it, he could see that there were multiple buttons, perhaps multiple attack modes that he could use. He didn't know what each did, and he didn't want to try them on himself, but it was good to know.

With his weapon, he began slinking around the tower, stepping quietly in his socks that made little noise on the ground. As he turned the corner in one of the stairwells, he saw a little confrontation going down between the two teams. Good! He didn't want to get involved, but he could at least get things rolling. He aimed with his crossbow, pressed a firing mode, and then took a shot before quickly dashing up the stairs.
1523311111112.title: The Rookie's ambush.

The witch is taken and put in stocks

choices: Rick manages to get Sareth and Silva into an argument!

152331111111212.content:
As Crystal jumped up in surprise as her partner started to laugh for no apparent reason, both Silva and Sareth made their move. Seeing as the female tiger was no longer a threat, they each quickly grabbed one of the Tickle Witch's arms as they threw her into a set of nearby stocks, Sareth locking the stocks on her feet as Silva quickly got to work, grabbing some rope on one of the many racks nearby in order to tie Crystal's wrists behind her back, said person giving a yelp as she dropped her pistols, leaving her with nothing she could use to fight back.

"And that's that. Now, if you'll excuse us, we seem to have a date with Mr Rookie, who seems to have scampered off upstairs. Toodles!" Giggling with glee, Sareth practically skipped her way towards the nearby stairs which the oh-so-stealthy Rick had tried to inconspicuously take, before climbing upwards.

"And just to make sure that you won't be able to follow us, heres a little present from me." Grabbing one of the tickle shurikens from her pouch, Silva flicked it as it sliced through the air before getting stuck onto Crystal's naval. Erupting into ticklish laughter much like her partner, the stocks trapping Crystal's feet rattled violently as she tried to force her way out, to no avail.

Looking at the remaining person in the room, Silva saw that Kareesa could barely even stand as she giggled to herself, lost in the ticklish sensations that the bolt was causing her. "Better not get hit by that... Whatever it is. And since Miss Tiger over here seems to be enjoying herself, I think I can take my leave..." High-heels clacking against the stone steps, Silva followed her succubus partner upwards, journeying on to the second floor of the tower.
152331111111212.title: The witch is taken and put in stocks

The Tigress had recovered enough to toss the mine toward the Rookie.
The Tigress yelped out a warning as the other pair entered the floor.
1523311111112122.content:
With quick and quiet steps, Rick pranced up the spiral staircase and emerged onto one of the display rooms of the second floor. Available was another wide variety of tools and devices that he couldn't even guess as to their function. Some of them were more obvious, such as a grenade (or was it a mine?) and a whip (no, that wasn't a whip, it fell apart the moment he picked it up). On second thought, perhaps he should spend some more time examining these things.

That plan was put on hold as he heard the announcement from below. There had been a rather noisy kerfuffle coming from the stairwell, what sounded like one of the ladies getting soundly taken care of, but once it was over Rick heard one of the scarier pair announce that she and her partner planned to follow him upstairs. Cursing that he wasn't as sneaky as he'd hoped, he grabbed quickly whatever fit on the belt of his jockstrap (which wasn't much at all) before dashing through the doorway and deeper into the tower, leaving only a pile of strewn devices to show that he'd, in fact, been there.

Just as he began to think of a new plan, perhaps laying a trap or attacking them as they moved through a doorway, he noticed in the distant corner of the room he entered another spiral staircase. Out of nowhere, a nearly fully-formed plan popped into his head, and he made a run for it. Sprinting down the stairs, he returned to where the standoff was taking place only moments prior, ready to unfold his plan.

Both girls of the less scary team were decommissioned, even moreso than Rick had thought. That wasn't good, it meant he had to take on the last two himself without counting on any help from the third party. Still, his plan would work. As soon as exited the stairwell, he dropped what he hoped was a mine in the corner behind the doorway, where they would be walking through but out of sight. He bolted for the other stairwell, the first one he clambered up, and did the same. With the Tigress still laughing on the floor, he used her giggling thrashes to mask a third one he placed beneath her arm. Then, just to be sure he was out of sight, he took cover behind the Witch in her difficult restraints.

15411.content:
To say that Rick was surprised when he entered the arena would be a massive understatement. When he heard that the competition was going to take place within a coliseum, he thought it'd be a reasonably large ring but still somewhat akin to something like wrestling. No, the coliseum was nearly as big as a football field, and as if that weren't enough a several-story spire rose out of the middle! As bad as he was with directions, he could easily get lost in here...

Rick's socked feet padded into the arena, the sand of the coliseum floor being kept mostly out, although a few stray grains slipped through the ankles. Not enough to be bothersome, just enough for him to notice. He looked around in awe of the massive structure, coming out from one side of the arena wall, where he quickly notice the spikes protruding from them. Those things looked dangerous! Upon closer inspection, however, the spikes weren't nearly sharp enough to hurt, probably more for effect than anything.

Relieved, Rick rolled his shoulders as he looked around the arena. He didn't see anyone else there. Maybe he'd arrived early. If so, then the spire in the center looked like it deserved a look. Would be nice to know what it looked like on the inside.

Charlotte walked through one of the metal gates into the large arena, feeling the floor of smooth sand flow between her toes. The tower loomed ahead in the arena's center, many levels tall and quite spacious looking. Charlotte had heard that in each Free-For-All the interior of the tower was changed around and restocked with new tools.

From two other gates emerged her competitors. Both were across the arena from her but closer to each other. First was a man wearing only a strap covering his privates, Charlotte had heard his name was Rick. He had a couple recent battles under his belt but was still pretty new.
